# Specific Armor
## Lesser Minor Armor
**Lesser Minor Armor**


| **d%** | **LESSER MINOR ARMOR** | **PRICE** | **SOURCE** |
|---|---|---|---|
| 01–50 | [[Mithral Shirt\|Mithral shirt]] | 1,100 gp | Core Rulebook 466, Ultimate Equipment 128 |
| 51–100 | Masterwork armor or nonmagical armor made with special material | varies |  |
